bodyHeaderMark: I'm a France based Freelancer and student.
bodyHeader: Motivated and passionate, I've been studying computer science for 3 years and I've been freelancing for 2.
bio: 21 years old, athletic, creative and passionate about animals
checkMyWorks: Check Out Some of My Works!
luckToWork: I had the chance to work in a very interesting start-up, betM. I worked there for 1 year.
successApp: App N°50 in sport category on the AppStore
smartiDescription: Over the last few years I have completed several personal projects. Here I show you one of my latest projects which is available on the Google Play Store. I made this application to learn marketing (social networks, in-app), to improve my design skills and also to improve my react native skills.

education.degree: School of expertise in computer science
education.description: I learned IT thanks to this school. Learned C/C++, Python, React, DevOps (Git, Docker, Ansible) and many soft skills

education.degree: French high school diploma equivalent in Science
education.description: This school make me able to study Mathematics and Physics, 2 hobbies for me

work.description: Completion of various projects such as the automation of logo manufacturing (completion of SVG in Pick&Place format). Mostly made in Python. Discovery of telework.

work.title: Third year internship - Frontend developper
work.description:
I developed the mobile application in native React and helped with the design. I worked on the front, back and optimization (being an existing application).
It was very interesting and I learned a lot from this application. I discovered Firebase, a technology I am now comfortable with and enjoy.

work.title: Second year internship - Fullstack developper
work.description: First profesionnal discovery working as developper. Designer and developper of an application for decision-making purposes. Discovered web development (Back: Python/SQL, Front: ReactJS and Superset framework)

testimonialsTab.text: Pedagogical, educated, hard-working, Aurélien has many qualities for the realization of your projects.
Highly motivated to succeed, he knows how to work in a group and get really involved in his projects.

designBy: Designed by Aurélien Vandaële based on a template from Styleshout.com
